title: "Virgilio: The Unique Exemplar of Energy-Based Techniques"
first_phrase: In this final section, we delve into the unique techniques of Virgilio, a person known for his idiosyncratic approach to picking cards as a means of understanding daily life. He is generous, spontaneous, and prefers giving away his paintings as gifts rather than selling them. Virgilio believes that by concentrating our thoughts, we can shape our reality. The text also features a brief introduction to Prof. Erminio di Pisa, a charismatic researcher of hypnosis and instant healing who traveled extensively, including to South Korea. Both of these individuals' energy-based techniques form a fundamental part of courses for achieving personal objectives.
content: He knows that this energy we work with in hypnotism cannot be touched or felt, but exist. It agrees is a sort of entanglement between two minds that is at work. Virgilio is undoubtedly a unique exemplar. We have studied him over several years. We have striven to wrest from his modus operandi as many techniques as we could. Nowadays, Virgilio’s energy-based techniques form an integral component of our courses. He has personally given us encouragement in this regard. “If people practice such techniques, they feel better, different, endowed with energy, and they can attain whichever objective they are aiming for”. Some suggestions of Virgilio for well living 7 – Instant Healing – Prof. Erminio di Pisa Prof. Erminio di Pisa was a person marked by exceptional charm and energy. He specialized in instant hypnosis and in instant healing especially. He was also a medium (= a psychic). Though he lived and worked in Milan, he travelled abroad as well. He was for instance in South Korea following an invitation.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the energy-based techniques developed by Virgilio and the instant healing methods of Prof. Erminio di Pisa are powerful tools for those seeking to improve their well-being and achieve their goals. Both individuals have dedicated their lives to studying and exploring the potential of the human mind, and their teachings continue to inspire and benefit countless individuals around the world. By practicing these techniques, one can experience a profound transformation in their physical, mental, and emotional state, leading to a more fulfilling and fulfilling life.
